Please ask Vincent Prioul or check the GitHub repository for the password.
34 years old, living in Rennes, France
Actively seeking a position in Android or iOS mobile application development
No app installed to share the text

- Development and optimization of Android and Android Auto applications for ASO, Renault, DMA Armatures, and IER/Blue Systems.

 - Implementation of new features in Kotlin using Jetpack Compose within a Clean Architecture or modular architecture framework.

 - Client relationship management and project coordination across various initiatives.

- Development and optimization of Android and Android Auto applications for ASO, Renault, DMA Armatures, and IER/Blue Systems.

 - Implementation of new features in Kotlin using Jetpack Compose within a Clean Architecture or modular architecture framework.

 - Client relationship management and project coordination across various initiatives.

- Update of MojoSDK and MojoPro products on Android to align functionalities with iOS.

 - Integration of new features in C/C++ via JNI, support for 64-bit architectures, and migration to AndroidX, CMake 3.10.2, and NDK 21.

 - Added support for external cameras (ONVIF, USB/UVC), Camera2 API, SIP intercom, HEVC live/record, Video Return (VLC, Larix), and energy optimization (ScreenSaver).

 - Development in Kotlin, Java, and JNI, with automated testing using Appium and RobotFramework.

- Update of MojoSDK and MojoPro products on Android to align functionalities with iOS.

 - Integration of new features in C/C++ via JNI, support for 64-bit architectures, and migration to AndroidX, CMake 3.10.2, and NDK 21.

 - Added support for external cameras (ONVIF, USB/UVC), Camera2 API, SIP intercom, HEVC live/record, Video Return (VLC, Larix), and energy optimization (ScreenSaver).

 - Development in Kotlin, Java, and JNI, with automated testing using Appium and RobotFramework.

- Development of the DetectNow application for iOS and Android (App Store & Google Play).

 - Update of the audio digital watermark detection SDK in C/C++, with examples across multiple platforms (Android, iOS, macOS) and various programming languages (Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift).

 - Implementation of automated testing for Android and iOS (ADB, iOS Deploy, Python) and CPU/memory performance optimization.

- Development of the DetectNow application for iOS and Android (App Store & Google Play).

 - Update of the audio digital watermark detection SDK in C/C++, with examples across multiple platforms (Android, iOS, macOS) and various programming languages (Java, Kotlin, Objective-C, Swift).

 - Implementation of automated testing for Android and iOS (ADB, iOS Deploy, Python) and CPU/memory performance optimization.

- Development, maintenance, and updates of multiple Android mobile applications with various features.

 - Study on mobile application quality at Ovianet.

 - Implementation of a Jenkins continuous integration server with functional testing using Calabash for iOS and Android.

- Development, maintenance, and updates of multiple Android mobile applications with various features.

 - Study on mobile application quality at Ovianet.

 - Implementation of a Jenkins continuous integration server with functional testing using Calabash for iOS and Android.
Création de plusieurs petites applications sur Google Glass, Samsung Galaxy gear et Symfony2.

- Création d\’applications Google Glass avec connexion Bluetooth à des balises ibeacon lors de l\’approche d\’une balise connue des informations s\’affichaient.
 
 - Création d\’une application Jeu pour Google Glass avec pour une documentation pour apprendre à développer sur les lunettes Google Glass.
 
 - Création d’un Bundle Symfony2 
 
 - Création d’une application pour Samsung Galaxy Gear (Android et Tizen) avec les balises ibeacon bluetooth pour un concours Samsung .
Création de plusieurs applications web et mobile.

- Création d\’une application mobile/tablette (Android/iOS) avec Titanium Appcelerator pour l\’Espace des Sciences à Rennes. Utilisation des technologies map, camera, son, diaporama, Vidéo, Rest.
 
 - Réalisation d’un site web d\’administration pour copier un site existant avec les changements appropriés (création d’une nouvelle base de données et changement de fichier de configuration).
 
 - Réalisation d’une web application d\’administration pour une liste de textures (ajout, suppression, modification des textures), qui est utilisé sur une application Ipad.
Beginner-level iOS Swift 3 training. This course teaches Apple’s Swift language—its syntax, philosophy, and the specific features of Xcode for Swift—and how it differs from Objective-C.

Final year project: How to ensure the quality of mobile apps at Ovianet? Analysis, research, feasibility, development, integration, and deployment of a Jenkins continuous integration server with automated Calabash tests. Two-year training at SUPINFO Rennes.
Professional Degree in Distributed and Mobile Computing (IRM)
PHP/HTML/CSS and SQL training—website creation about ice creams with a database + 2.5-month company internship (Tactilia).
BTS IRIS (Computer Science and Industrial Networks for Technical Services)
1.5-month internship at the end of 2010 (Credit Mutuel Arkea).
Final year project in 2009 on a solar panel.
Played in several clubs (FC Stade Rennais, AS Saint Jacques Foot, TA Rennes Foot, AS Chantepie, Odia Football) since age 7. Also experienced multiple injuries, including two ACL tears.

Several competitions including 2× 24km Urban Trail Rennes, 24km Urban Trail Naoned, 2× 13km Böel Trail, 10km Urban Trail Kerlann, 8km & 10km Roazhon Run, 21km half marathon Cancale - Saint Malo, 12km Intrail Murros.
Scuba Diving (FFESSM Level 2 and PADI Advanced Open Water)
With the CSGR diving club: completed 15 dives around the world (5 in Malaysia, 1 in Corsica, 2 in Réunion Island, 7 in the Seychelles).
Play once a week since 2022, level 5, ranked around 20,000th.
Confident on all slopes in both skiing and snowboarding. Go skiing every 2 to 3 years.
Surf on beaches in Quiberon, Pornichet, Lacanau; also had sessions in Nazaré and Bayonne.
Try to do sessions every year at Nozay, La Rincerie, and at sea.
Used to compete as a child at Villejean pool. Occasionally swim in Rennes pools.
Played during corporate squash sessions with Aviwest.
